content.rendered:
Maple Departments

Admissions Department

Admissions enquiries, Admission applications, follow up and any concerns with admission into any of our affiliated Institutions.

Visa Department

Current Visa Clients and any concerns regarding your Visa applications.

Immigration Department

Assessments and Permanent
Residence applications.

Marketing Department

Marketing opportunities, Summer Tours and School visits as well as general information.

Canadian Office

Interests in affiliating with Maple Education Canada, Maple clients in Canada with Canadian Immigration concerns, internal flight bookings, Maple residence inquiries, permanent residence, post graduation work permit and study permit renewals.

Account Department

Invoices, Refunds and financial concerns.

Corporate Unit Department

Complaints, suggestions, any client concerns, residence and accommodation information.

Admissions Department

Admissions enquiries, Admission applications, follow up and any concerns with admission into any of our affiliated Institutions. Email- admissions@mapleeducation.ca

Visa Department

Current Visa Clients and any concerns regarding your Visa applications
Email- visa@mapleeducation.ca

Immigration Department

Assessments and Permanent
Residence applications
Email- info@mapleeducation.ca

Marketing Department

Marketing opportunities, Summer Tours and School visits as well as general information.
Email – admissions@mapleeducation.ca

Canadian Office

Information about our institution affiliation and for maple clients with Canadian immigration concerns, Flight bookings and Maple Residence inquiries.
Email- visa@mapleeducation.ca

Account Department

Invoices, Refunds and financial concerns Email- info@mapleeducation.ca

Corporate Unit Department

Complaints, suggestions, any client concerns, residence and accommodation information, . Email- admissions@mapleeducation.ca
